Articles.Content:
I've never posted a mission report before, this is my first. I've seen lots of over-engineered Duna missions, so I decided to try one in a more minimalist style. No nukes, no on-orbit assembly. It has a surface habitat, an RTG-powered rover, and a habitat for the orbiter. I believe that it is 100% stock, although I've been using KSPX for so long it may be there are some KSPX parts in there and I just don't notice them anymore. Anyway, hope you enjoy.

Javascript is disabled. View full album
Looks cool! I always loved how adventurous and kind of emotional they are, and it makes me think 'These guys might not return. Damn' It adds a thrill to KSP, and that is definitely what KSP needs.
